@string/title_emergency
@string/title_notifications
@string/title_location
@string/title_traffic
@string/title_police

string-array.name: traffic_points
string-array.item: "Heavy vehicles movement will be put-off the roads from 1st week of February to avoid traffic congestion "
"Pasra-Thadvai –Eturunagaram road has been widened and upgraded to two lane for smooth flow of traffic ">
"Alternative route at Gattamma Temple (Mulug) for free movement of the vehicles who traditionally stop-over there for a while on the way to Medaram">
"Pasra-Narlapur road being made a One-way">
"Re-laying of By-pass roads at Culvert points">
"Separate routes are made for RTC Buses (Pasra-Thadvai-Medaram) and for Private vehicles (Pasra- Narlapur)">
"Parking of the vehicles – More than 27 parking places are identified in nearly 1000 Acres">
"More than 12-Holding areas covering 270 Acres identified to have enough buffer space in the event of re-routing or holding the vehicles on the route"
"Police Personnel arranged at Check-Posts and Police Out-post to guide the traffic"
"Cranes and towing vehicles stationed at Strategic locations to clear any traffic obstructions"
"Patrolling by the Bike-borne Police to de-clog any traffic congestions"

string-array.name: car_points
string-array.item: "Don't Drink while Driving."
"Don't Drive under the influence of drugs.">
"Obey the instructions of Police on duty."
"Don’t overtake vehicles. "
"Use the indicator or hand signals when changing lanes."
"Adhere to permitted speed limits"
"Don't use your cell phone while driving. If you must, move to the left, halt and then make the call."
"Do not drink and drive as it adversely affects your judgement and abilities."
"Wear seat belts."
"If you feel sleepy, stop at a safe place. Do not stop on the hard shoulder of a motorway"

string-array.name: pilgrims_points
string-array.item: "Warangal rural police welcomes to Medaram Jathara."
"Warangal rural Police have made vast arrangements for security and darshan of pilgrims."
"Take care of valuable articles, ornaments, vehicles and also children."
"Incase of missing persons, contact police control room and wait till arrival of missing person."
"Maintain ‘Q’-Line while boarding RTC buses with patience, co-operate with Police and RTC staff."
"Do not keep valuable items in vehicles."
"Take care of children and old aged persons, do not let them free."
"Do not accept any food items from unknown persons."
"Please keep your home address and mobile numbers at your children and old aged persons."

string-array.name: crowd_points
string-array.item: "CCTVs and drone cameras will be utilized to monitor the situation from Command and Control room."
"Drop gates will be installed on all routes leading to Gadde to prevent crowd surge at worship place."
"Professional swimmers will be deployed at bathing ghats to avert accidental drowning."
"Police help desks have been arranged all along the route for the benefit of pilgrims."

"Public Addressing Systems, Out posts and Control rooms are being established for announcing about the orderliness, missing persons,crime control, RTC busses information, safe guard of personal belongings, precautions against drowning."

resources.string: Goddess Saralamma Ammavaru will arrive on Gadde from Kannepally village
Goddess Sammakka Ammavaru will arrive on Gadde from Chilakala Gutta.
Jathara will be in its full swing. Crores of pilgrims will have darshan of these “DEVATHAS’and will offer their “MOKKUBADULU”.
